import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Scanner;
import java.util.Collections;
class canteen{
public static void main(String args[]) throws Exception
{
int m,o,f,k,g,j,l,n1,a,b,c,d,e,i,n;
int [] t=new int [100];
Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
BufferedReader br=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
n1=Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
m=0;
for(o=0;o<n1;o++)
{


n=Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
int[][] aa=new int [100][5];
ArrayList<String> ar=new ArrayList<String> ();


for(i=0;i<n;i++)
ar.add(br.readLine());
Collections.sort(ar);
i=0;
while(i<ar.size())
{
String x=ar.get(i);
k=0;
f=0;
for(String p:x.split(" "))
{
if(f==0)
{f=1;
continue;}
aa[i][k++]=Integer.parseInt(p);
}
i++;
}

a=0;b=0;c=0;d=0;e=0;
t[m]=0;
while(true)
{

for(j=0;j<i;j++)
{
for(l=0;l<5;l++)
{
if(aa[j][l]==0)
continue;
if(a!=0)
a--;
if(b!=0)
b--;
if(c!=0)
c--;
if(d!=0)
d--;
if(e!=0)
e--;

if(l==0)
{t[m]=t[m]+a;
a=5;
}
if(l==1)
{t[m]=t[m]+b;
b=5;
}
if(l==2)
{t[m]=t[m]+c;
c=5;
}
if(l==3)
{t[m]=t[m]+d;
d=5;
}
if(l==4)
{t[m]=t[m]+e;
e=5;
}

aa[j][l]=aa[j][l]-2;
break;
}
}
f=0;
for(j=0;j<i;j++)
{for(l=0;l<5;l++)
{
if(aa[j][l]!=0)
{f=1;break;
}
}
if(f==0)
break;
}

if(f==0)
break;

}

/*for(j=0;j<i;j++)
{for(l=0;l<5;l++)
System.out.print(aa[j][l]);
System.out.println("");
}*/
m++;
}
for(i=0;i<m;i++)
System.out.println(t[i]);

}
}
